question: Ravikirti, the Jain author of the Aihole inscription, claims to have received "the highest favour" from which of the following kings?
explanation: The Chalukyas were the followers of Brahmanical religion but they also followed a policy of religious toleration. During their ascendancy, Jainism prospered in the Deccan. Ravikirti, the Jain author of the Aihole inscription, claims to have received "the highest favour" from Pulakesin II.
